subject: Track and Field
Deaths (Obituaries)
lead_paragraph: Mr. Thomas, the first high jumper to clear 7 feet indoors, was perhaps best known for his cold war rivalry with Valery Brumel of the Soviet Union.
snippet: Mr. Thomas, the first high jumper to clear 7 feet indoors, was perhaps best known for his cold war rivalry with Valery Brumel of the Soviet Union.
